item.title: ViacomCBS Networks International Completes Acquisition of Chilevisión
item.description: NEW YORK --(BUSINESS WIRE)--Sep. 30, 2021-- ViacomCBS Networks International (VCNI), a division of ViacomCBS Inc. (NASDAQ: VIAC, VIACA), today announced the closing of the previously announced acquisition of Chilevisión from WarnerMedia, a division of AT&T (NYSE: T).

item.title: “PAW PATROL: THE MOVIE” Proves Its Pedigree With Fans
item.description: NEW YORK--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Paramount+ announced today that PAW PATROL: THE MOVIE, which premiered on the service the same day it hit theaters on August 20, ranked as one of the service’s most-watched originals. This press release features multimedia.
